com.omerozer.knit

Class InternalPresenter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.omerozer.knit.InternalPresenter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MemoryEntity, MessageReceiver, NativeViewCallbacks, PresenterInterface, EventHandler

    public abstract class InternalPresenter
extends java.lang.Object
implements EventHandler, PresenterInterface, MessageReceiver
    This class is the master class of KnitPresenter that is exposed to the user. Knit's annotation processor creates these InternalPresenters that initialize and contain the actual KnitPresenter. All KnitPresenters annotated with a Presenter will have an internal counterpart that manages them. The master class created by the processor will have a name "ClassName" + "_Presenter". Actual KnitPresenter instance will be wrapped around an Exposer class that will expose all of it's public and package-private methods to the InternalPresenter . T
    See Also:
    Presenter, KnitPresenter, PresenterInterface
